briefTitle: Identification of Sentinel Lymph Nodes With Methylene Blue and Isotope
officialTitle: Identification of Sentinel Lymph Node (SLN) in Breast Cancer Care: Clinical and Economical Evaluation of a Double Method Using Isotope and Methylene Blue Dye Injection.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Determination of an optimized protocol for SLN identification, with a double method using isotope and methylene blue dye injection.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patients with infiltrative breast cancer (diagnosed pre-operatively by core biopsy)
* approval and informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* chemotherapy
* locoregional radiotherapy
* prevalent axillary lymph node
